name: Zero spring episode 2
description: It is a sequel to Zero spring episode 1. First you can choose to display the previous synopsis so you can enjoy it without playing the previous game. Although the previous work was FPS, it became JRPG to express the story completely from episode 2.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows7/8/10 (32/64bit） Processor: Intel core 2 duo or AMD athlon Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4400 or Radeon HD 5430 OpenGL 3.0 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 123 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows7/8/10 (32/64bit） Processor: Intel core or AMD athlon2 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 AMD Radeon  HD 5000 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 150 MB available space
